attributes.action: Instruct Warwick District Council not to build homes near Finham (Coventry)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As part of the government's initiative to build 3 million new homes in Britain, Warwick District Council (WDC) are considering plans to build 10,800 new homes on the borders of Finham, Coventry.
The current infrastructure supporting the existing 2000 homes within Finham is already at breaking point with roads severely congested at peak times.
WDC should find alternative sites closer to their own infrastructure and existing housing, rather than imposing their new build on the fringe of Coventry whose services and infrastructure can not cope already.
